Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class VmAllocationPolicySimple

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicySimple
public class VmAllocationPolicySimple
extends VmAllocationPolicy
VmAllocationPolicySimple is an VmAllocationPolicy that chooses, as the host for a VM, the host with less PEs in use.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
